de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.postprocessing

Class AutoReloadPostProcessorEffect<T extends PostProcessorEffect>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.postprocessing.PostProcessorEffect
      • de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.postprocessing.AutoReloadPostProcessorEffect<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, GameEventListener<GraphicsSettingsChangeEvent>

    public class AutoReloadPostProcessorEffect<T extends PostProcessorEffect>
extends PostProcessorEffect
implements GameEventListener<GraphicsSettingsChangeEvent>
    Implementation of a PostProcessorEffect which automatically re-initialises itself after graphics settings change.

      • rebind

        public void rebind()
        Description copied from class: PostProcessorEffect
        Concrete objects shall be responsible to recreate or rebind its own resources whenever its needed, usually when the OpenGL context is lost. Eg., framebuffer textures should be updated and shader parameters should be reuploaded/rebound.
        Specified by:
        rebind in class PostProcessorEffect
